titles.title: A bill to provide for the sale of certain lands of the University of Arkansas.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the University of Arkansas to sell certain lands (commonly known as the Walker Tract) in Washington County, Arkansas, if all of the proceeds of such sale are used for the purposes of the University's agricultural research facilities and programs.
